data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garbelotto, Thereza De A., Grazia, Jocelia, Campos, Luiz Alexandre (2019): Description of two new genera of Ochlerini (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae). Zootaxa 4612 (3): 387-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.3.5|18 occurrences
